OOC :go ahead 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kraftlos 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2007 4:22 AM
  Subject: R=
e: G2


  OOC: Can I have Trelos use a CR chamber?  He has never used one s=
ince I made him lol



  On 11/5/07, Airshadow <airly2002@... > wro=
te:

    OOC: I hate my conmputer, when ITS want internet runs

    Percept=
or arrived at the base mpulling asort ot pod. He enter to the same chamber =
that Jhiaxus and Hydras are  and facing them he said ironically "Someone wa=
s well-behaved here... Santa cames earlier this year"


    Hydras quietly =
laughted 
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Airshadow 
      =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, November 03, 2007 7:59 AM=

      Subject: Re: G2



      Perceptor:

      Perceptor leave the new b=
ase inside aq shuttle and  moved towards the old one.


      OOC: he will =
arrive in my next post



        ----- Original Message ----- 
        Fro=
m: Richard Allen 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday,=
 November 02, 2007 8:40 PM
        Subject: Re: G2


        ::Jhiaxus/Scor=
ponok::

        Jhiaxus smirks, knowing that the puppet is done. He moves =
back to the computers to monitor the Atlantis base.

        Jhiaxus: Hydra=
s, you might want to check this out. Saying that the Maximal base is under =
attack is the understatement of the millinium. I'm reading Minions all over=
 the base. So many that it's hard to pick up Maximal signatures through the=
m.

        Scorponok: It seems I have arrived at a busy time...

        A=
irshadow <airly2002@...> wrote: 

          Hydras:

          "The=
 we should take advantage quickly of current situation, his base is under a=
ttack"said Hydras and soon he received an aencoded message from percepor "I=
t seems that the puppet is done, Perceptor is coming"






            ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
            From: Richard Allen 
            To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, November 01, 2007 7:58=
 PM
            Subject: Re: G2


            ::Scorponok::

            Sc=
orponok: I guess I came at a good time then. The thought of destroying Rodi=
mus Prime... or Hot Rod... Whatever he calls himself. That foolish Targetma=
ster Autobot was a pain in many of my plans so long ago.

            Airsh=
adow <airly2002@...> wrote: 
              Hydras:

              H=
ydras hissed and said dryly "gretings... now our chances to defeat Rodimus =
prime increases"


                ----- Original Message ----- 
          =
      From: Richard Allen 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    =
            Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2007 12:43 PM
                Subjec=
t: Re: G2


                ::Jhiaxus/Zarak/Scorponok::

                Jh=
iaxus: We'll use the puppet.

                Jhiaxus spins out of the chai=
r and stands up to greet the G2 newcomer.

                Outside the base=
 the Scorponok body transforms to a standing position with Zarak becoming t=
he head. Scorponok walks into the base to eventually find Hydras and Jhiaxu=
s.

                Scorponok: Lord Jhiaxus, I am Scorponok; Headmaster war=
rior of the Generation 2 Decepticon Empire.

                Jhiaxus nods..=
.

                OOC: Hydras should recognize Scorponok and know Zarak. A=
nd not like him I might ad.

                xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@yah=
oo.com> wrote: 
                  Hydras:

                  Hydras typed s=
ome buttons and the doors opened he hissed "tell them 
                  th=
at they can come in and I have more info bout this bot"

                  =
A winged bot pictures, his wings were dull black hue. His body was 
       =
           a deep black with dull red highlights. 

                  "Jsut=
 we have to wait that perceptor send us the puppet... unless 
             =
     you want to do this personally..." said devilish Hydras
